alert.note: Alert for Saline (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 08 at 8:35PM CDT until June 10 at 8:27PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Little Rock AR has issued a Flood Warning for the following river in Arkansas... Saline River At Benton affecting Saline County. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saline River At Benton. * WHEN...Until Friday evening. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Minor flooding begins at 18 feet, flooding of low lying pastures along the west bank. At 20.0 feet, Pastures along west bank will flood. There may be some low lying county roads near the river flooding. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage later this evening and rise to a crest of 20.0 feet by tomorrow morning (Thursday June 9). - Flood stage is 18.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecast 7 PM Crest Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Crest Time Date Saline River Benton 18.0 16.4 Wed 7 PM 16.1 8.6 6.9 20.0 7 AM 6/09 &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. River forecasts are based on current conditions and rainfall forecasted to occur over the next 24 hours. During periods of flooding...Evening forecasts are reissued with updated rainfall forecasts. Observed and forecasted stage data plots are available on our Advanced Hydrologic Prediction Service web page at... www.weather.gov/lzk Under the Current Conditions section...Select River and Lakes AHPS.
